Class.name: VideoLinkExtractor
Class.description: A static class for extracting video links from blog archives and processing them for download.

Method.name: StartBulkParsingAsync
Method.description: Main entry point to process blog URLs from the frontier. Dequeues URLs and orchestrates the parsing of each blog's archive.

Parameter.name: frontier
Parameter.description: The frontier containing blog URLs to process.

Parameter.name: page
Parameter.description: The Puppeteer page instance used for navigation and scraping.

Parameter.name: settings
Parameter.description: Scraping settings and configurations.

Parameter.name: downloader
Parameter.description: The downloader module for handling video downloads.

Method.name: ProcessSingleBlogAsync
Method.description: Processes a single blog URL by navigating to its archive page, extracting video links, and enqueuing them for download.

Parameter.name: blogUrl
Parameter.description: The URL of the blog to process.

Parameter.name: scraperLogger
Parameter.description: Logger instance for logging scraping activities.

Parameter.name: page
Parameter.description: The Puppeteer page instance used for navigation and scraping.

Parameter.name: settings
Parameter.description: Scraping settings and configurations.

Parameter.name: downloader
Parameter.description: The downloader module for handling video downloads.

Method.name: NavigateToPageAsync
Method.description: Navigates the Puppeteer page to a specified URL with error handling and logging.

Parameter.name: page
Parameter.description: The Puppeteer page instance used for navigation.

Parameter.name: url
Parameter.description: The URL to navigate to.

Parameter.name: logger
Parameter.description: Logger instance for logging navigation activities.

Parameter.name: pageDescription
Parameter.description: Description of the page being navigated to.

Method.name: Page_Request_BlockImages
Method.description: Event handler to block image requests during page navigation.

Parameter.name: sender
Parameter.description: The event sender.

Parameter.name: e
Parameter.description: Request event arguments.

Method.name: ParseBlogArchivePagesAsync
Method.description: Parses through the paginated archive of a blog, extracting links to individual video pages.

Parameter.name: blogUrl
Parameter.description: The URL of the blog.

Parameter.name: currentArchiveUrl
Parameter.description: The current archive page URL.

Parameter.name: scraperLogger
Parameter.description: Logger instance for logging scraping activities.

Parameter.name: page
Parameter.description: The Puppeteer page instance used for navigation and scraping.

Parameter.name: settings
Parameter.description: Scraping settings and configurations.

Method.name: ExtractVideoPageLinksFromCurrentPageAsync
Method.description: Extracts video page links from the currently loaded archive page and adds them to the provided set.

Parameter.name: page
Parameter.description: The Puppeteer page instance used for navigation and scraping.

Parameter.name: settings
Parameter.description: Scraping settings and configurations.

Parameter.name: blogUrl
Parameter.description: The URL of the blog.

Parameter.name: pageNum
Parameter.description: The current page number being processed.

Parameter.name: videoPageLinks
Parameter.description: The set to store extracted video page links.

Method.name: HandleArchivePaginationAsync
Method.description: Finds the 'next' pagination link, clicks it, and waits for navigation.

Parameter.name: page
Parameter.description: The Puppeteer page instance used for navigation and scraping.

Parameter.name: settings
Parameter.description: Scraping settings and configurations.

Parameter.name: blogUrl
Parameter.description: The URL of the blog.

Parameter.name: currentPageNum
Parameter.description: The current page number being processed.

Method.name: ProcessVideoPageLinksAsync
Method.description: Iterates through collected video page links, navigates to each, extracts the video source URL, and enqueues it.

Parameter.name: videoPageLinks
Parameter.description: The set of video page links to process.

Parameter.name: blogUrl
Parameter.description: The URL of the blog.

Parameter.name: page
Parameter.description: The Puppeteer page instance used for navigation and scraping.

Parameter.name: settings
Parameter.description: Scraping settings and configurations.

Parameter.name: downloader
Parameter.description: The downloader module for handling video downloads.

Method.name: ExtractVideoSourceUrlFromPageAsync
Method.description: Extracts the direct video source URL (e.g., from a video tag's src) from the currently loaded page.

Parameter.name: page
Parameter.description: The Puppeteer page instance used for navigation and scraping.

Parameter.name: settings
Parameter.description: Scraping settings and configurations.

Parameter.name: videoPageLink
Parameter.description: The video page link to process.

Method.name: StartSingleArchiveAsync
Method.description: Starts processing a single archive page.

Parameter.name: startUrl
Parameter.description: The starting URL of the archive page.

Parameter.name: page
Parameter.description: The Puppeteer page instance used for navigation and scraping.

Parameter.name: scraperSettings
Parameter.description: Scraping settings and configurations.

Parameter.name: downloader
Parameter.description: The downloader module for handling video downloads.
